title: Salary
description: Regular payment received by an employee from an employer.

title: Investment Returns
description: Profits or gains earned from investments such as stocks, bonds, or mutual funds.

title: Rental Income
description: Money earned from renting out property or assets to tenants.

title: Freelance Earnings
description: Income earned by providing services on a freelance or contract basis.

title: Business Profits
description: Net income earned from operating a business after deducting all expenses.

title: Gifts and Inheritances
description: Money or assets received as a gift or inheritance from family or friends.

title: Interest Income
description: Income earned from interest payments on savings accounts, bonds, or loans.

title: Dividend Income
description: Payments received from owning stocks or shares in a company.

title: Capital Gains
description: Profit earned from selling an asset or investment for more than its purchase price.

title: Royalty Income
description: Payments received from allowing someone else to use your intellectual property or creative work.
